name: Hindi GK and Current Affairs
description: Hindi GK & Current Affairs (  &   ) application provides many general knowledge and Current Affairs topics for competitive exam preparation in Hindi Language.  This app is very useful for the students and other people who are preparing for government entrance exams like Public Service Commission (TNPSC), UPSC,SBI Associate Banks PO, MPPSC, AIEEE, AIPMT, CAT, IIT-JEE, PCS, GMAT, SSB, GATE, GPSC, JKPSC, APSC, Mizoram PSC, WBPSC, UKSSSC, CRPF, KPSC, JPSC, HPSC, OPSC, IBPS PO (Institute Of Banking Personnel Selection Probationary Office), IBPS Clerk, IBPS CWE RRB, SBI Clerk, SBI PO, IBPS SO, CTET, RBI Assistant, RBI Grade B Officer, SBI Associate Banks Clerk.  Using this application you can read and practice various GK & Current Affairs topics in and increase knowledge.   Main three parts of application is..  Question Bank -  : - Read various GK questions with its answer.  Current Affairs :  -Read month wise current affairs questions with answer.  Test  -Practice is only for preparation.  Feature :- * Beautiful and user friendly interface.  * Choose text size for better readability  * All Content provided in Hindi language so easy to read and understand.  Disclaimer :   All type of information is collected from different sources, if you found any information that violates your any type of rights please contact to us at astirtechsolutions@gmail.com.
